## hey pardner

```{r}
# pie crab data 

pie_crab_sub <- pie_crab %>% 
  select(date, water_temp, size, name)
```

```{r}
pie_crab_sum <- pie_crab_sub %>% 
  group_by(name) %>% 
  summarize(mean_temp = mean(water_temp, na.rm = TRUE),
            count = n())
```
